directions: Combine yogurt, cucumbers, garlic, salt, cumin, curry and ginger in blender. Puree until smooth. Strain through fine sieve into large bowl. Refrigerate until well chilled, about 2 hours. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Keep refrigerated.)
Ladle soup into bowls. Top with radishes and serve.
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds pickling cucumbers, trimmed, peeled, cut into 1-inch pieces.
title: Chilled Cucumber-Yogurt Soup with Radishes
